sentences.sContent: The Xinluo students were accomplished in the Confucianism sutra, could compose in types of literature and indite many excellent Chinese writings.
sentences.sContent_eng: The Xinluo students were accomplished in the Confucianism sutra, could compose in types of literature and indite many excellent Chinese writings.
sentences.sCn: 新罗留学生精通儒家典籍，熟悉各种汉文学体裁的写作，创作了大量优秀的汉文学作品。

trans.tranCn: 写(文章,信等)创作, 赋诗, 创作
